info.name: Tumblr - Greyscale Dashboard v2.0
info.description: A greyscale theme for the dashboard, updated for fixes here and there.  23 AUGUST 2013 -- UPDATED TO CURRENT!
info.additionalInfo: This is based on the lovely work of akimocha, based on their greyscale dashboard here, updated and redistributed with permission. Works best in WEBKIT browsers (Chrome, Safari, and others listed here)!
